body:
Leaving for a couple of days/weeks. Because of stuff that has happen in my personal life and on the server/forums. If I don't come back I just want to say I enjoyed my time on this server/forums (before Avicore) If you want to contact me my Skype is akov27 and my email is 99250sf@gmail.com. I would like to thank the staff that were nice to me.
-Staff izjust4fun, PeachYas, Jake41901, DoctaPop, jozzmcozz, Evocal
That is all.
Cya.

Edit: If I do play it will be walls.
